content: When you see a title like “10 strategies to go viral on any platform,” you wonder if the article will really live up to the headline. This post totally does. You’ve struck a phenomenal balance of being thorough without being overwhelming. And the scads of examples you included are perfect for my learning style. Thank you for taking the time to write a digestible post about a topic where so many “experts” phone it in. You’re the real deal, Todd. And THANK YOU for sharing your free book The Ultimate Guide to Infinite Ideas. The first step to a viral post is deciding what to write about. I’m excited to have this cheat sheet!
